titles.title: Ferry County Hospital Accessibility Act
To require the conveyance of a small parcel of Federal land in the Colville National Forest, Washington, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health.

bill.summary: 3/7/2005--Introduced. Ferry County Hospital Accessibility Act - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey to Ferry County Public Hospital District No. 1. specified land in Colville National Forest, Washington.
